Text:
This is not a "loader" at all and it just a dirty hackaround same as rest of the so-called "activations".

Just activate via a KMS server or get a cheap upgrade license for now until Daz from mydigitallife forums comes up with a real OEM loader.

Avoid these crappy hacktivations as they just lead to issues and possibly infections.
Thanks for the heads up chacrE5a.
